n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

count = 0
while all(x % 2 == 0 for x in a):
    a = [x // 2 for x in a]
    count += 1

print(count)

N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0
while all(a % 2 == 0 for a in A):
    A = [a // 2 for a in A]
    cnt += 1

print(cnt)
